name: Exploratorium Blueprint Package
desc: An archaic solid-state drive extracted from the guts of an Exploratorium factory-ship, with the correct adaptors for modern systems it can allow Heavy Industry to produce Exploratorium Drones, though most would balk at the thought.

name: #Remnant Blueprint Package
desc: An original Tri-Tachyon Master Schematic database holding the designs of their beloved AI warfleet, loaded onto a battered Tri-Pad Pro. Prior to the collapse, these things would have been purchasable from the corporation for a king's ransom, but after two AI wars the corporation itself has lost all production data on these vessels... supposedly. Reguardless, these schematics can now only be acquired from Remnant Nexi, and they must be payed for in blood and gunfire.
